original: Karth, Bengt Olof (Olle), länsarkitekt, Visby, f. 12/3/OS i Sthlm av ing. G. W. Karth o. Emilia Olsson. G. 40 m. Marja Hed. Barn: Monica o. Staffan. — Stud:ex. i Sthlm 24, arkit:ex. v. KTH 28, Konsthögsk. 32, stud:res. i Ital. 28, Engl., Frankr., Tyskl. o. Danm. 31. Varit anst. h. prof. L. L Wahlm’an, arkit. G. Birch-Lindgren, Cyrillus Johansson, Aug. Ewe o. Wolter Gahn samt v. stads-arkit :kont. i Borås, v. kgl. byggn :styr. 37, :stadsarkit. i Visby 38-44, bitr. läns-arkit. i Gotl. län 38-45, länsairkit. sed. 45. Egna arb. såsom hyreshus, vililor m. m. 30-38, har f. länsarkit:-kont. utfört bl. a. Akermanska stift, i Visby 40, STF:s vandrarhem i Visby Börs 46, barnhem s. å., kyrkorest., stadsplaner m. m.
translated: Karth, Bengt Olof (Olle), County Architect, Visby, b. 12/3/OS in Stockholm to engineer G.W. Karth and Emilia Olsson. Married in 1940 to Marja Hed. Children: Monica and Staffan. Education: Graduated from high school in Stockholm in 1924, received degree in architecture from KTH in 1928, attended the Royal Academy of Fine Arts in 1932, studied in Italy in 1928, and in England, France, Germany, and Denmark in 1931. Employed by professors L.L. Wahlm'an, architect G. Birch-Lindgren, Cyrillus Johansson, Aug. Ewe, and Wolter Gahn, as well as the city architect's office in Borås, the Royal Building Board in 1937, and the city architect's office in Visby from 1938 to 1944. Deputy County Architect in Gotland County from 1938 to 1945, and County Architect since 1945. Completed own projects like apartment buildings, villas, etc. from 1930 to 1938. As County Architect, carried out various projects including the Akermanska Foundation in Visby in 1940, STF's hostel in Visby Börs in 1946, and a children's home in the same year, as well as church restorations, urban planning, etc.
